card.name: Vermin
card.property: Vermin enters play with 3 rat counters. Forced Interrupt: When Vermin would take any amount of damage, remove 1 rat counter from him instead.

card.name: Vermin
card.property: Vermin enters play with 3 rat counters. [star] Interrupt: When Vermin attack, remove 1 rat counter from him → Vermin does not take consequential damage from this attack.

card.name: Rats and More Rats
card.property: Contents: Vermin (I) and Vermin (II). Vermin (II) and Vermin (III) in expert mode instead.) Vermin and Standard Encounter sets. One modular encounter set (recommended: Feral Instincts). Setup: Put the Even More Rats Environment into play . Put a Regular Rats minion into play engaged with each player. Shuffle the encounter deck. Advance to stage 1B.

card.name: Thirst for Revenge
card.property: Contents: Scorpion (I) and Scorpion (II). Scorpion (II) and Scorpion (III) in expert mode instead.) Scorpion and Standard Encounter sets. One modular encounter set (recommended: Feral Instincts). Setup: Put the J. Jonah Jameson suport into play . Put the Scorpion's Tail into play and attach it to Scorpion. Shuffle the encounter deck. Advance to stage 1B.

alternate.name: Thirst for Revenge
alternate.property: Scorpion wants revenge on J. Jonah Jameson for turning him into the beast that he is today.

card.name: Toxic Gas
card.property: Hinder 1[per player] (<i>When Revealed: Place an additionnal 1[per Player] threat here<i>).
